citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
- The primary protocol for the use of mice and guinea pigs does not contain any description of the final disposition method
for the animals. Protocols involving animals must have a complete description of their intended use. The facility should
determine appropriate options to dispose of animals after testing, and provide a complete description of these options in
their protocols.
Correct by 20 June 2024
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.31(e)(3) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
- The primary protocol for the use of mice and guinea pigs does not contain any description of the final disposition method 
for the animals. Protocols involving animals must have a complete description of their intended use. The facility should 
determine appropriate options to dispose of animals after testing, and provide a complete description of these options in 
their protocols. 
Correct by 20 June 2024 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative. 
 
 n
